it.polito.dp2.FDS

Interface FlightMonitor


  • public interface FlightMonitor
    FlightMonitor is the entry point to get information about flight information

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Aircraft> getAircrafts()
      Gives the list of known aircrafts
      FlightReader getFlight(String number)
      Gets an interface for reading information about a single flight given its number
      FlightInstanceReader getFlightInstance(String number, GregorianCalendar date)
      Gets an interface for reading information about a single flight instance given flight number and date
      List<FlightInstanceReader> getFlightInstances(String number, GregorianCalendar startDate, FlightInstanceStatus stat)
      Searches the list of flight instances
      List<FlightReader> getFlights(String dep, String arr, Time startTime)
      Searches the list of flights

    • Method Detail

      • getAircrafts

        Set<Aircraft> getAircrafts()
        Gives the list of known aircrafts
        Returns:
        a set of objects representing known aircrafts

      • getFlights

        List<FlightReader> getFlights(String dep,
                            String arr,
                            Time startTime)
                              throws MalformedArgumentException
        Searches the list of flights
        Parameters:
        dep - the departure airport code (if null, all departure airports are considered)
        arr - the arrival airport code (if null, all arrival airports are considered)
        startTime - the time starting from which the search is made (if null, the search starts from 00.00am). This time is considered in the time zone of the departure airport.
        Returns:
        a list of interfaces for reading the flights matching passed arguments
        Throws:
        MalformedArgumentException - when dep or arr are invalid airport code strings (valid code strings are made of 3 alphabetic characters)

      • getFlightInstances

        List<FlightInstanceReader> getFlightInstances(String number,
                                            GregorianCalendar startDate,
                                            FlightInstanceStatus stat)
                                              throws MalformedArgumentException
        Searches the list of flight instances
        Parameters:
        number - the flight number (if null, all flight numbers are considered)
        startDate - the date starting from which instances are searched (if null, all dates are considered)
        stat - the status of the flight instances to be returned (if null all statuses are considered)
        Returns:
        a list of interfaces for reading the flight instances matching the passed arguments
        Throws:
        MalformedArgumentException - if the flight number is an invalid flight number string (valid strings are made of 2 alpha characters followed by at most 4 digits)

      • getFlight

        FlightReader getFlight(String number)
                       throws MalformedArgumentException
        Gets an interface for reading information about a single flight given its number
        Parameters:
        number - the number of the flight we are interested in
        Returns:
        an interface for reading flight information about the flight with the given number or null if no flight with that number is available
        Throws:
        MalformedArgumentException - if the flight number is null or an invalid flight number string (valid strings are made of 2 alpha characters followed by at most 4 digits)

      • getFlightInstance

        FlightInstanceReader getFlightInstance(String number,
                                     GregorianCalendar date)
                                       throws MalformedArgumentException
        Gets an interface for reading information about a single flight instance given flight number and date
        Parameters:
        number - the number of the flight we are interested in
        date - the date of the flight we are interested in
        Returns:
        an interface for reading information about the flight instance with the given number and date or null if none exists
        Throws:
        MalformedArgumentException - if any argument is null or if the flight number is an invalid flight number string (valid strings are made of 2 alpha characters followed by at most 4 digits)
